title: Music Visualizer
description: Visualizing audio as a mesh based on frequencies with Three.js and SoundCloud API.

title: ClothSim
description: Real-time simulation of cloth using a mass and spring based system.

title: Pathfinder
description: Physically-based renderer based on 3D COLLADA models and a pathtracing algorithm.

title: Mosaic Builder
description: Automatic image mosaicing with the Multi-Scale Oriented Patches (MOPS) algorithm.

title: AudioCrawler
description: LSTM classifier that reliably identifies music genres based on audio spectrograms.
